response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $14,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value of $15,000, making it an excellent opportunity for you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. We're confident this product will be a game-changer for your company.", "product_price": 14000}
